00024 #ifndef _PEAKDETECTORNAIVE_HPP_

00028 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00029 #include "PeakDetector.hpp"
00030 #include <memory>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace frequency {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// Naive implementation of the PeakDetector interface. 
00038 ///
00039 /// Reports peaks where:
00040 ///  -# magnitude > noise*noiseFactor
00041 ///  -# magnitude is increasing on [center-detectionRadius, center] 
00042 ///  -# magnitude is decreasing on [center, center+detectionRadius] 
00043 ///
00044 /// All peaks are reported as charge==1
00045 
00046 class PWIZ_API_DECL PeakDetectorNaive : public PeakDetector
00047 {
00048     public:
00049     /// create an instance.
00050     static std::auto_ptr<PeakDetectorNaive> create(double noiseFactor = 5, 
00051                                                    unsigned int detectionRadius = 2);
00052 
00053     virtual double noiseFactor() const = 0;
00054     virtual unsigned int detectionRadius() const = 0;
00055 
00056     /// \name PeakDetector interface
00057     //@{
00058     virtual void findPeaks(const pwiz::data::FrequencyData& fd, 
00059                            pwiz::data::peakdata::Scan& result) const = 0; 
00060     virtual ~PeakDetectorNaive(){}
00061     //@}
00062 };
00063 
00064 
00065 } // namespace frequency
00066 } // namespace pwiz
00067 
00068 
00069 #endif // _PEAKDETECTORNAIVE_HPP_
